# cmccloudv2_autoscaling_health_check_policy (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# create health check policy
resource "cmccloudv2_autoscaling_health_check_policy" "health_check_policy1" {  
    name     = "as_group1_health_check1"
    interval = 300
    action   = "RECREATE"
    period   = 100
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `action` (String) Name of action to execute
- `name` (String) The name of the autoscaling health check policy

### Optional

- `interval` (Number) Number of seconds between two adjacent checking
- `period` (Number) Number of seconds since last node update to wait before checking node health
- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String)
- `delete` (String)
